title: Samsung April 2022 security update is now rolling out for these Galaxy devices
content:
Continuing the stellar efforts in recent months, Samsung is now rolling out the April 2022 security update to selected Galaxy devices. Here’s every device that has been updated so far.

more…

The post Samsung April 2022 security update is now rolling out for these Galaxy devices appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung is rolling out the April 2022 security update, the second of the year, to many of its phones and tablets; here's the full list.
